data.caption: Audited Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On 31 March, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we would like to inform you that the meeting of Board of Directors of M/s Algoquant Fintech Limited (''''the Company'''') held on Monday, the 30th day of May, 2022 inter-alia, approved the following matters:- 1. Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022
2. Declaration of unmodified opinion in terms of Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
3. Other matters as discussed.

data.caption: Audited Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On 31 March, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we would like to inform you that the meeting of Board of Directors of M/s Hindustan Everest Tools Limited (''the Company'') held on Wednesday, the 30th day of June, 2021 inter-alia, approved the following matters:-
1. Audited Financial Results of the Company for year ended 31st March, 2021 and financial results for the quarter ended 31st March, 2021;
2. Declaration of unmodified opinion in terms of Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption:
Audited Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And
Financial Year Ended On 31 March, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to regulation 30 read with regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we would like to inform you that the meeting of Board of Directors of M/s Hindustan Everest Tools Limited ('the Company') held on Wednesday, the 30th day of June, 2021 inter-alia, approved the following matters:-
1. Audited Financial Results of the Company for year ended 31st March, 2021 and financial results for the quarter ended 31st March, 2021;
2. Declaration of unmodified opinion in terms of Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
3. Other matters as discussed.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2020
data.news_body:
The Board of directors at its meeting held today i.e. 15th February, 2021 have approved The Un-audited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2020. A copy of duly signed Un-audited Financial Results of the company along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors under Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations, 2015 for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2020, is enclosed herewith.

Kindly take the same in your records.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. On 15Th February, 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held today, viz. 15th February, 2021 has considered and unanimously approved the matters given in the attached file.

Kindly take the above information in your records and oblige.
